amendment.description: Amendment eliminates the funding for the Tropical Forest Conservation Act and applies the $20 million in savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 291 printed in the Congressional Record eliminate debt restructuring, and increases Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A061) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A061) offered by Mr. McClintock.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A061) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
